LanguageData.ScrambledDeathclawEggs.label: Suspicious Scrambled
LanguageData.ScrambledDeathclawEggs.description: Suspicious Scrambled ingredients are best left unsaid.
LanguageData.RadHemogenPack.label: Glowing Blood Pack
LanguageData.RadHemogenPack.description: A translucent bag containing a green glowing liquid. The label says "Not food" in black marker. When used, it restores hunger and greatly increases the effects of radiation.
